products.name_vi: Bát ăn chậm - Hình trái dâu

prompt_engineering.base_prompt: a {animal_type} with a mint green strawberry-shaped slow feeder bowl
prompt_engineering.detailed_prompt: a cute {animal_type} eating from a mint green plastic slow feeder bowl shaped like a strawberry with raised ridges inside, the bowl is placed on the ground in front of the {animal_type}'s paws
prompt_engineering.style_modifiers: chibi anime style, kawaii aesthetic, soft pastel colors, gentle lighting, clean background
prompt_engineering.composition_hints: bowl positioned in lower center of frame, pet's head looking down at bowl, bowl takes up about 30% of lower frame
prompt_engineering.object_description: oval mint green plastic bowl with strawberry leaf decoration, anti-gulp raised pattern inside
prompt_engineering.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted bowl, multiple bowls, floating objects, realistic style, dark atmosphere, messy background, occluded bowl

controlnet_guidance.spatial_relationship: bowl below pet's head, aligned with front paws

products.name_vi: Bát ăn đôi Cherry - Cho mèo

prompt_engineering.base_prompt: a {animal_type} with a cherry-themed double bowl
prompt_engineering.detailed_prompt: a cute {animal_type} eating from a green leaf-shaped base with two red ceramic bowls designed like cherries, the double bowl is placed on the ground in front of the {animal_type}
prompt_engineering.style_modifiers: chibi anime style, kawaii aesthetic, vibrant fruit colors, bright cheerful lighting, simple clean background
prompt_engineering.composition_hints: double bowl centered in lower frame, pet positioned above looking down, bowls take up 35% of lower portion
prompt_engineering.object_description: green leaf-shaped platform with two round red cherry bowls, connected design
prompt_engineering.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted bowls, multiple sets, floating, realistic render, dark mood, cluttered background, separated bowls

controlnet_guidance.spatial_relationship: dual bowls symmetrically placed, pet centered above

products.name_vi: Chuông huấn luyện cho thú cưng

prompt_engineering.base_prompt: a {animal_type} with colorful pet training bells
prompt_engineering.detailed_prompt: a cute {animal_type} standing next to a set of five colorful dome-shaped training bells with paw print buttons (pink, white, green, red, yellow), bells arranged on the ground beside the {animal_type}'s paw
prompt_engineering.style_modifiers: chibi anime style, kawaii aesthetic, rainbow bright colors, soft lighting, minimal background
prompt_engineering.composition_hints: bells arranged in small cluster to the side, pet looking at or touching one bell, bells occupy 20% of frame
prompt_engineering.object_description: five small dome bells in vibrant colors (pink, white, green, red, yellow) with black paw print buttons on top
prompt_engineering.negative_prompt: blurry bells, too many bells, floating objects, realistic style, dark lighting, messy arrangement, bells far from pet

controlnet_guidance.spatial_relationship: bells grouped near front paw, pet touching or looking at bells

products.name_vi: Nệm Sonice hoa tiết da báo Square Bed Size
products.name_en: Leopard Print Pet Bed Square Size

prompt_engineering.base_prompt: a {animal_type} lying on a leopard print pet bed
prompt_engineering.detailed_prompt: a cute {animal_type} resting on a soft rectangular cushion bed with cream white center and brown leopard print borders, the bed is on the ground with the {animal_type} sitting or lying comfortably on it
prompt_engineering.style_modifiers: chibi anime style, kawaii aesthetic, warm cozy colors, soft gentle lighting, clean background
prompt_engineering.composition_hints: bed takes up 50% of lower frame, pet positioned on or beside bed, bed slightly behind pet to show depth
prompt_engineering.object_description: rectangular cushion bed with raised borders, cream white plush interior, brown leopard print exterior sides
prompt_engineering.negative_prompt: blurry bed, floating bed, multiple beds, realistic fabric texture, dark atmosphere, messy room, bed too small

controlnet_guidance.spatial_relationship: pet sitting/lying on bed, bed visible under and around pet

prompt_engineering.base_prompt: a {animal_type} wearing a pink soft muzzle
prompt_engineering.detailed_prompt: a cute {animal_type} wearing a light pink soft mesh muzzle with black buckle straps around the snout and head, the muzzle gently covers the dog's mouth while allowing breathing
prompt_engineering.style_modifiers: chibi anime style, kawaii aesthetic, soft pink tones, gentle caring atmosphere, simple background
prompt_engineering.composition_hints: muzzle visible on dog's face, straps around head, dog looking forward or slightly to side, face centered in frame
prompt_engineering.object_description: pink soft mesh muzzle basket covering snout, black adjustable straps around head and neck, gentle secure fit
prompt_engineering.negative_prompt: blurry muzzle, unrealistic fit, floating straps, harsh realistic style, scary atmosphere, muzzle too tight, distorted face

controlnet_guidance.spatial_relationship: muzzle fitted on dog's snout, straps visible around head

metadata.notes: Complex placement - requires accurate face detection

prompt_engineering.base_prompt: a {animal_type} wearing a white collar with a pink bell charm
prompt_engineering.detailed_prompt: a cute {animal_type} wearing a white synthetic leather collar with silver buckle and a small pink spherical bell charm hanging from it, the collar fits snugly around the {animal_type}'s neck
prompt_engineering.style_modifiers: chibi anime style, kawaii aesthetic, soft pastel colors, gentle lighting, clean background
prompt_engineering.composition_hints: collar visible around neck, bell hanging below, pet facing forward or at angle, collar occupies neck area
prompt_engineering.object_description: white smooth leather collar with silver metal buckle and small round pink bell charm
prompt_engineering.negative_prompt: blurry collar, floating collar, collar too tight or loose, realistic style, dark background, no bell visible, distorted neck

controlnet_guidance.spatial_relationship: collar wrapped around neck, bell hanging below throat area

metadata.notes: Requires accurate neck detection for proper placement

global_settings.default_style: chibi anime style, kawaii aesthetic, vibrant colors
global_settings.default_negative: blurry, distorted, realistic, dark, scary, multiple products, floating objects
